column1: Local Foods////Their wheat bread is perfect. It comes out toasted
column2: and the crust is crunchy and crisped beautifully. This is the only place you'll hear me raving about bread crust
column3: because I'm usually not a fan of it. The bread itself also has a hearty wheat flavor but does not overpower the fillings. On the contrary
column4: whenever I order this sandwich on wheat bread
column5: I feel that it compliments the sandwich filling even better than the default ciabatta!
